name: {{name}}
content: Newfall is the perfect town, but if you think you can have any of it, you're an idiot.

name: {{name}}
content: Not the girls with sun-kissed legs, rollerblading down the streets.

name: {{name}}
content: Not the million-dollar yachts, bobbing lazily in the bright-blue harbor.

name: {{name}}
content: Not the cheerful laughter of the families, picnicking in the park.

name: {{name}}
content: None of it will ever be yours.

name: {{name}}
content: And who's to blame? Society and shitty genetics?

name: {{name}}
content: To have winners, you need losers. And in life's zero-sum game... sorry, kid - snake eyes.

name: {{name}}
content: The days all bleed together in a diarrhea of misery and self-loathing.

name: {{name}}
content: Every morning, you sleep in like a bum. Get yelled at for being a disappointment.

name: {{name}}
content: You work a pointless job, earning a few pointless bucks that you spend on pointless pizzas that taste like pepperoni and ballsack.

name: {{name}}
content: Every night, you eat alone, trying not to cry.

name: {{name}}
content: And then you cry. What else is there?

name: {{name}}
content: Train-smashed tomato sauce is the only way out... but not if you're a pussy.

name: {{name}}
content: Growing up, you expect life to be a fairytale.

name: {{name}}
content: You'll make it through school, get a good job, meet the girl of your dreams.

name: {{name}}
content: That's what you tell yourself as you stuff your promposal into the garbage because you're too much of a wimp to ask.

name: {{name}}
content: There's more fish in the sea. More opportunities.

name: {{name}}
content: That's what goes through your head as you stay home and play video games instead of going to that party...

name: {{name}}
content: There's always another chance!

name: {{name}}
content: Then you're suddenly halfway to thirty, and your Cinderella story has turned to ash.

name: {{name}}
content: You're forced to bit life's poisoned apple and realize that you have nothing. You're nobody.

name: {{name}}
content: You're all alone.

name: {{name}}
content: All your friends have long since moved on, and the only girl who wants to talk to you is called Alexa.

name: {{name}}
content: All those chances you thought you had - gone.

name: {{name}}
content: You're stuck in a pool with no ladder, hoping you drown before...

name: {{name}}
content: Before life hooks its marionette strings into your flesh once more, and you pray that one of the will catch your neck in a tight noose.

name: {{name}}
content: There my phone goes again, taunting me with a flicker of hope.

name: {{name}}
content: Well... better check the latest promotional message from my dear mobile carrier...

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: I know what you did last weekend.

name: {{name}}
content: Who the hell is this?

name: {{name}}
content: Hmm... hidden number.

name: {{name}}
content: It's probably some idiot claiming to have a webcam recording of me masturbating.

name: {{name}}
content: Sorry, man. No money. No friends. No one who cares.

name: {{name}}
content: All I have is a need for human interaction and this UNO reverse card...

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: The answer is... absolutely nothing.

name: {{name}}
content: Who is this? Also, that's not true!

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: Completing Castlevania for the 167th time and attempting to make an origami cat out of an old pizza box doesn't count.

name: {{name}}
content: Shit. That's odd, but I did tweet that. Always thought my three followers were bots.

choices.content: It was a pretty good origami cat, though. Right?

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: Doesn't matter. You're lazy and self-destructive.

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: That's why you're here now, contemplating your failures.

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: You've had no significant impact on anyone's life. [flora] hates you. You have no special talents. You've never even had an interesting science fair project!

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: Some of it is bad luck. Most of it is your own doing.

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: I've never seen anyone make so many poor choices in life. It saddens me.

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: I've never seen anyone make so many poor choices in life. It saddens me.

choices.response: No, I'm not. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

choices.content: Is this the NSA? I can explain the browser history...
choices.response: No. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

choices.content: And all those choices have led me to you. Are you the woman I've been waiting for all my life?
choices.response: No, I'm not. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

speaker: hidden_number
name: Unknown
content: All you need to do is tell me your name.

choices.response: My name isn't important. If you want to know what I have to say, tell me yours.

choices.content: Are you also after my credit card number? You're going to be disappointed.
choices.response: What? No! If you want to know what I have to say, tell me your name.

choices.content: Hold up. Are you a Nigerian prince, by any chance?
choices.response: What? No! If you want to know what I have to say, tell me your name.

name: {{name}}
content: It's probably a scammer, but what do I have to lose?

name: {{name}}
content: My name is [mc]. There you go! Now tell me!

name: {{name}}
content: Hello?

name: {{name}}
content: That's really funny...

name: {{name}}
content: Most people ghost me after I send them a picture. Ghosted after a name... that's a first.

name: {{name}}
content: Oh well, what's the point of staying awake, anyway?
